Description: Four beads made of faience and glass. A: Small fragment made of vivid translucent blue glass, elongated slightly curved fragment, probably production waste (?). B: Small flattened spherical bead made of dark blue glass. C: Disc-shaped bead made of turquoise faience. D: One thin segmented cylindrical bead made of turquoise faience.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E4.1, low level
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
